Karden is a new tab extension designed for Web3.0 users.

Kard is a new type of nft as well as an application by Using a decentralized distribution mechanism.

You can get a Kard in a similar way you get an NFT. 

add the karden to your chrome browser to experience.

- The NFT held by the user can be displayed on the startup page /display user's nft on the startup page
- customize desktop layouts with desired components
- Free wallpaper switching/  select wallpapers freely from official sources
